      • QVTRelation2Alloy

        QVTRelation2Alloy(java.lang.Boolean top,
                 QVTRelation2Alloy q2a,
                 org.eclipse.qvtd.pivot.qvtbase.TypedModel direction,
                 org.eclipse.qvtd.pivot.qvtrelation.Relation rel,
                 EMF2Alloy translator)
            throws ErrorTransform,
                   ErrorAlloy,
                   ErrorUnsupported
        Constructs a new QVT Relation to Alloy translator. Translates a QVT Relation (top or non top) to Alloy in a given direction.
        Parameters:
        rel - the QVT Relation being translated
        direction - the target direction of the transformation
        top - whether the QVT Relation is top or not
        Throws:
        ErrorTransform,
        ErrorUnsupported
        ErrorAlloy
        ErrorTransform

        Throws:

      • calculateFact

        private edu.mit.csail.sdg.alloy4compiler.ast.Expr calculateFact()
                                                         throws ErrorAlloy,
                                                                ErrorTransform,
                                                                ErrorUnsupported
        Calculates the Alloy expression denoting the QVT Relation. Takes the shape "forall whenvars : when => (forall sourcevars : sourcedomain => (exists targetvars+wherevars : targetdomain && where))"
        Returns:
        the Alloy expression representing the QVT Relation
        Throws:
        ErrorAlloy
        ErrorTransform
        ErrorUnsupported
